document_data.name: Wandering Woodsman's Tavern
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wandering Woodsman's Tavern''' was a quaint little inn and a tavern located in the town of [[Conyberry]] on the edge of the [[Neverwinter Wood]].
document_data.Atmosphere: The Wandering Woodsman's Tavern catered to local woodcutters and farmers who crowded the inn's common room. The establishment sold the infamously terrible but strong [[Conyberry Stout]].
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the establishment was run by a middle-aged male [[human]] innkeeper who offered libations and cheap guest accommodations with an occasional performer stemming his instrument to entertain guests.
